ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 39. East wind around 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
